plays.text: Penalty to Jon Sim 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Patrick Roy

Penalty to Richard Matvichuk 2 minutes for Tripping Dan Hinote
Goal scored by Joe Sakic assisted by Pascal Trepanier and Adam Foote
Penalty to Brad Larsen 2 minutes for Holding Mike Modano
